name: Forest Patrol
description: The Town Guard has asked you to patrol the forest and eliminate any dangerous creatures threatening the town.

objectives.description: Kill 3 Forest Wolves in the woods

dialogue.offer: The forest has become dangerous lately. Strange creatures are attacking travelers. Would you help us by patrolling the woods and eliminating the threat?
dialogue.accept: Excellent! Be careful out there. The wolves have become unusually aggressive. Return when you've dealt with them.
dialogue.decline: I understand. The forest can be dangerous for inexperienced adventurers.
dialogue.progress: How goes the patrol? I still hear reports of wolf attacks from travelers.
dialogue.complete: Well done! The roads are safer thanks to you. Here's your reward.
dialogue.completed: Thanks to your efforts, the forest is much safer now.
